title: John Woo
summary: John Woo Yu-Sen SBS (Chinese: 吳宇森; born 1 May 1946)[1] is a Hong Kong film director, producer and screenwriter. [2] Woo is known for his highly chaotic action sequences, stylized imagery, Mexican standoffs, frequent use of slow motion and allusions to wuxia and Western cinema.[3] He was also a pioneer of heroic bloodshed films (a crime action film genre involving Chinese triads) and the gun fu genre in Hong Kong action cinema, before working in Hollywood films.
